price: Dir-se-lhes-á: "Comei e bebei com deleite, pelo que fazíeis!"
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
